h2_title: Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Pale-Axe Stalwart
The Pale-Axe Stalwart is a Character boss you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. After defeating the imposing Stalwart, you'll be asked to complete a side quest for him.
## Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide

Occasionally, he will kick at you or jump up in the air, raising his axe above him. When he does the latter, he will slam it down as he lands, but even with this move, dodging is still the way to go.

img_summary: The image depicts the Pale-Axe Stalwart, a fiery, axe-wielding boss encountered in Chapter 5 of *Black Myth: Wukong*. The character is shown mid-action in a dark, desolate environment with ancient, weathered architecture in the background. The glowing embers on his body and weapon emphasize his intimidating presence and fiery theme, aligning with the guide's description of his combat moves, such as axe slams and kicks. This visual serves to illustrate the boss's appearance and setting, complementing the written strategy for defeating him.
